name: Five Hour Game: Software Project
description:
A game that attempts to capture the essence of a software project. QWOP-esque game where you try to smash keyboard with difficult controls. You also should avoid hitting your coworker, but I'm not judging you if you do.

Made from scratch in five hours, with some help from the assets below.

InspectorJ for Smashing, Wooden Fence, C.wav -sound

http://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/3522...

taavi55 for big smash -sound

http://freesound.org/people/taavi55/sounds/152396/

Trollarch2 for Keyboard Typing -sound

http://freesound.org/people/Trollarch2/sounds/3316...

Kalibrk for JirkaScream 2 -sound

http://freesound.org/people/Kalibrk/sounds/339308/

adriancalzon for Scream 05 -sound

http://freesound.org/people/adriancalzon/sounds/22...

TheSubber13 for Scream 1 -sound

http://freesound.org/people/TheSubber13/sounds/239...

redafs for Zombie Monster Scream -sound

http://freesound.org/people/redafs/sounds/348310/

Pixel Sagas for Symtext -font

http://www.dafont.com/symtext.font

hypocore for Blank Clock -image

https://openclipart.org/detail/217092/blank-clock
